attributes.action: Choose the next leader of the neighbour party and thus the next Prime Minister with a fight to the death
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Picture this: a cross between Harry Potter, Ant versus Dec and Upper Class Twit of the year.
The candidates will undergo tests of strength, intelligence and courage. There will be one winner; the last candidate alive. Imagine,triumphantly they stand on a podium in the middle of a massive stadium, dirty and bloody, shirt torn to show a six pack, or a flat stomach with just a bit of cleavage, a tear in their eye as they wave to the crowds who sing to them a rousing chorus of "Gold", our new national anthem. The people of England will dance in the street, full of admiration for their new leader. Surely then will we have a person worthy of leading our country. Sure, it'll be expensive, but with sponsership, audience tickets and tv rights, we're sure to make a profit.
This tournament, if my petition is successful, will be designed by me with input from the public. A documentary will be made and films in the future will depict this glorious event...

rejection.details: However humorous your intention, we cannot host a petition which endorses violence.
